title: What’s left after world records and gravel ultras? If you’re Ashton Lambie, it’s America’s Cup yacht racing
content:
Lambie is currently training as a pedaling 'cyclor' for team American Magic, which will compete in this year's America's Cup in Spain.

Read the full article at What’s left after world records and gravel ultras? If you’re Ashton Lambie, it’s America’s Cup yacht racing on Velo.
author: Betsy Welch
